info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close

Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST /search/?q=pompidou+georges HTTP/1.1
Host: deces.matchid.io
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Alt-Svc: h3=":443"; ma=86400, h3-29=":443"; ma=86400 Cf-Cache-Status: DYNAMIC Cf-Ray: 73dfbeada8fd7c44-LAX Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 21 Aug 2022 01:55:09 GMT Expect-Ct: max-age=604800, report-uri="https://report-uri.cloudflare.com/cdn-cgi/beacon/expect-ct" Nel: {"success_fraction":0,"report_to":"cf-nel","max_age":604800} Report-To: {"endpoints":[{"url":"https:\/\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\/report\/v3?s=qMTu5BbERayjLktIXvfYLyma9hiOeH0zh0vuYgBjXIdCyLTcW6aTHDaJwcE3XM9DAD3VgoDQcWyNw7bAGXkdzRvAp8JX5Xozen1iA9a1zoxR5KfosEuX1izKAmv1vf3s5wQS"}],"group":"cf-nel","max_age":604800} Server: cloudflare Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15552000; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff 405 Not Allowed

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 39832
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 39832
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
deces.matchid.io.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=R8qdKQhQRtLbMF_bALIP-CGC16_BJCZSy8Olu7RTzY8"

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 14242
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 14242
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 NS

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
matchid.io.	1800	IN	SOA	tia.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2284656383 10000 2400 604800 3600
